doc.field: Gay USA, Vol. XIV, Episode No. 41
Gay USA, Vol. XIV, Episode No. 41
1. Lesbian and Gay News: Andy Humm and Ann Northrop discuss recent general events that relate to the LGBT community.
COMMERCIAL: Homo Xtra, "The one. The only. The original."

2. "Lambda Update": Beatrice Dohrn, Legal Director of Lambda Legal Defense and Education Fund, introduces Lou Maletta's interview with Evan Wolfson, Lambda Marriage Project Director, regarding Hawaii same-sex marriage case.
COMMERCIAL: GMHC (Gay Men's Health Crisis), "Help us help."
COMMERCIAL: Ad Council, International Association of Clerks, Recorders, Election Officials, & Treasurers, "Vote for Yourself"
COMMERCIAL: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC), "America Responds to AIDS"
COMMERCIAL: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC), "America Responds to AIDS" (2)

5. Footage of Rainbow Card first anniversary event. Includes footage of Martina Navratilova, [tennis star]; Suzanne Goldberg, Staff Attorney for Lambda Legal Defense and Education Fund; Urvashi Vaid, former Executive Director of the National Lesbian and Gay Task Force; and Tim Rosta, Executive Director of Lifebeat.
6. Footage of video from the Gay, Lesbian, and Straight Teachers Network (GLSTN), called "Setting the Record Straight", regarding teaching tolerance for lesbians and gays in schools.
